questions.question: 1. Ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa ibinyabiziga bigenda bigomba kugira:
questions.option3: c)A na B ni ibisubizo by`ukuri

questions.question: 2. Ijambo “akayira” bivuga inzira nyabagendwa ifunganye yagenewe gusa:
questions.option2: b) Ibinyabiziga bigendera ku biziga bibiri
questions.option3: c) A na B ni ibisubizo by`ukuri
questions.correctAnswer: c) A na B ni ibisubizo by`ukuri

questions.question: 3. Umurongo uciyemo uduce umenyesha ahegereye umurongo ushobora kuzuzwa n`uturanga gukata tw`ibara ryera utwo turanga cyerekezo tumenyesha :
questions.option1: a) Igisate cy`umuhanda abayobozi bagomba gukurikira
questions.option3: c) Igabanurwa ry`umubare w`ibisate by`umuhanda mu cyerekezo bajyamo
questions.correctAnswer: c) Igabanurwa ry`umubare w`ibisate by`umuhanda mu cyerekezo bajyamo

questions.question: 4. Ahantu ho kugendera mu muhanda herekanwa n`ibimenyetso bimurika ibinyabiziga ntibishobora kuhagenda :
5. Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba gukorerwa isuzumwa buri mwaka:
questions.option1: a) Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara abagenzi muri rusange
questions.option2: b) Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara ibintu birengeje toni 3.5

questions.question: 6. Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n`ikinyamitende itatu ntibugomba kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:
7. Uburebure bw`ibinyabiziga bikurikira ntibugomba kurenga metero 11 :
questions.option1: a) Ibifite umutambiko umwe uhuza imipira
questions.option2: b) Ibifite imitambiko ibiri ikurikiranye mu bugari bwayo

questions.question: 8. Ikinyabiziga kibujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira :
questions.option1: a) Ahatarengeje  metero 1 imbere cyangwa inyuma y`ikinyabiziga gihagaze akanya gato cyangwa kanini :
questions.option2: b) Ahantu hari ibimenyetso bibuza byabugenewe
questions.option3: c) Aho abanyamaguru banyura mu muhanda ngo bakikire inkomyi

questions.question: 9. Kunyuranaho bikorerwa:
questions.option3: c) Iburyo iyo unyura ku nyamaswa

questions.question: 10. Icyapa cyerekana umuvuduko ntarengwa ikinyabiziga kitagomba kurenza gishyirwa gusa ku binyabiziga bifite uburemere ntarengwa bukurikira:
11. Ahatari mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa mu isaha wa velomoteri ni:
12. Umuyobozi ugenda mu muhanda igihe ubugari bwawo budatuma anyuranaho nta nkomyi ashobora kunyura mu kayira k`abanyamaguru ariko amaze kureba ibi bikurikira:

13. Ku byerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n`ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana ihindura ry`ibyerekezo byabyo. Birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarurarumuri uretse ibitegetswe ariko ntibireba amatara akurikira:
questions.option2: b) Amatara ari imbere mu modoka
questions.correctAnswer: b) Amatara ari imbere mu modoka

questions.question: 14. Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by`umwihariko umuvuduko ntarengwa w`amapikipiki mu isaha ni:
15. Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza babwita:
questions.option2: b) Feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini

questions.question: 16. Nibura ikinyabiziga gitegetswe kugira uduhanagurakirahure tungahe:
17. Amatara maremare y`ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
questions.option1: a) Iyo umuhanda umurikiye umuyobozi abasha kureba muri metero 20
questions.option2: b) Iyo ikinyabiziga kigiye kubisikana n`ibindi
questions.correctAnswer: b) Iyo ikinyabiziga kigiye kubisikana n`ibindi

questions.question: 18. Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenga abiri y`ubwoko bumwe keretse kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:
19. Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n`igare cyangwa velomoteri ntiburenza ibipimo bikurikira:
20. Ibinyabiziga bikoreshwa nka tagisi, bitegerereza abantu mu nzira nyabagendwa, bishobora gushyirwaho itara ryerekana ko ikinyabiziga kitakodeshejwe. Iryo tara rishyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira:
questions.option1: a) Ni itara ry`icyatsi rishyirwa imbere ku kinyabiziga
questions.option2: b) Ni itara ry`icyatsi rishyirwa ibumoso
questions.option3: c) Ni itara ry`umuhondo rishyirwa inyuma
questions.option4: d) A na C ni ibisubizo by`ukuri
questions.correctAnswer: a) Ni itara ry`icyatsi rishyirwa imbere ku kinyabiziga

questions.question: 1. Za otobisi zagenewe gutwara abanyeshuri zishobora gushyirwaho amatara abiri asa n`icunga rihishije amyasa kugirango yerekane ko zihagaze no kwerekana ko bagomba kwitonda, ayo matara ashyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira :
questions.option3: c) Rimwe rishyirwa imbere irindi inyuma
questions.option4: d) b na c ni ibisubizo by`ukuri
questions.correctAnswer: c) Rimwe rishyirwa imbere irindi inyuma

questions.question: 2. Itara ryo guhagarara ry`ibara ritukura rigomba kugaragara igihe ijuru rikeye nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
questions.option1: a) Metero 100 ku manywa na metero 20 mu ijoro
questions.option2: b) Metero 150 ku manywa na metero50 mu ijoro
questions.option3: c) Metero 200 ku manywa na metero100 mu ijoro

questions.question: 3. Iyo umuvuduko w`ibinyabiziga bidapakiye ushobora kurenga km50 mu isaha ahategamye, bigomba kuba bifite ibikoresho by`ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera:

4. Birabujijwe kugenza ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri naza romoruki zikururwa nabyo, iyo ibiziga byambaye inziga zidahagwa cyangwa inziga zikururuka zifite umubyimba uri hasi ya cm 4. Ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa kubinyabiziga bikurikira:
questions.option1: a) Ku binyabiziga by`ingabo bijya ahatarenga km25

questions.question: 5. Igice cy'inzira nyabagendwa kigarukira ku mirongo ibiri yera icagaguye ibangikanye kandi gifite ubugari budahagije kugira ngo imodoka zitambuke neza, kiba ari:
6. Ubugari bwa romoruki ntiburenza ubugari bw`ikinyabiziga kiyikurura iyo ikuruwe n`ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
questions.option3: c) Ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande rwayo
questions.correctAnswer: c) Ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga kometse ku ruhande rwayo

questions.question: 7. Iyo hatarimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y`imbere y`imodoka abana badafite imyaka:
8. Icyapa kivuga gutambuka mbere y`ibinyabiziga biturutse imbere gifite amabara akurikira:
9. Ni ryari itegeko rigenga gutambuka mbere kw`iburyo rikurikizwa mu masangano:
questions.option1: a) Iyo nta cyapa cyo gutambuka mbere gihari
questions.option2: b) Iyo ikimenyetso kimurika cyagenewe ibinyabiziga kidakora
questions.option3: c) A na B ni ibisubizo by`ukuri
questions.correctAnswer: c) A na B ni ibisubizo by`ukuri

questions.question: 10. Ibimenyetso bimurika byerekana uburyo bwo kugendera mu muhanda kw'ibinyabiziga bishyirwa iburyo bw'umuhanda. Ariko bishobora no gushyirwa ibumoso cyangwa hejuru y`umuhanda:
questions.option1: a) Hakurikijwe icyerekezo abagenzi bireba baganamo
questions.option2: b) Hakurikijwe icyo ibyo bimenyetso bigamije kwerekana

questions.question: 11. Iyo itara ry`umuhondo rimyatsa rikoreshejwe mu masangano y`amayira ahwanyije agaciro rishyirwa ahagana he:
questions.option4: d) a na b ni ibisubizo by` ukuri
questions.correctAnswer: d) a na b ni ibisubizo by` ukuri

questions.question: 12. Inkombe z`inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z`umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa n`ibikoresho ngarurarumuri. Ibyo bikoresho bigomba gushyirwaho ku buryo abagenzi babibona :
questions.option1: a) Babona gusa ibumoso bwabo iby`ibara ritukura
questions.option2: b) Iburyo babona iby`ibara risa n`icunga rihishije gusa

questions.question: 13. Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba gukorerwa isuzumwa rimwe mu mezi 6:
questions.option1: a) Ibinyabiziga bitwara abagenzi muri rusange
questions.option2: b) Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara ibintu birengeje toni 3.5

questions.question: 14. Iyo kuyobya umuhanda ari ngombwa bigaragazwa kuva aho uhera no kuburebure bwawo n`icyapa gifite ubuso bw`amabara akurikira:
15. Ku mihanda ibyapa bikurikira bigomba kugaragazwa ku buryo bumwe:
16. Ni iyihe feri ituma imodoka igenda buhoro kandi igahagarara ku buryo bwizewe bubangutse kandi nyabwo, uko imodoka yaba yikoreye kose yaba igeze ahacuramye cyangwa ahaterera:
questions.option3: c) Feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini
questions.correctAnswer: c) Feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini

questions.question: 17. Ibizirikisho by`iminyururu cyangwa by`insinga kimwe n`ibindi by`ingoboka bikoreshwa gusa igihe nta kundi umuntu yabigenza kandi nta kindi bigiriwe uretse gusa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigere aho kigomba gukorerwa kandi nturenze na rimwe km 20 mu isaha, ibyo bizirikisho bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
questions.option1: a) Agatambaro gatukura kuri cm 50 z`umuhanda
questions.option2: b) Ikimenyetso cy`itara risa n`icunga rihishije
questions.option3: c) Icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana gifite cm 20 kuri buri ruhande
questions.correctAnswer: c) Icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana gifite cm 20 kuri buri ruhande

questions.question: 18. Uretse mu mujyi, ku yindi mihanda yajyenwe na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n`ibintu, uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifite imitambiko itatu cyangwa irenga hatarimo makuzungu ni:

19. Ubugari bw`imizigo yikorewe n`ibinyamitende itatu n`ubwiyikorewe n`ibinyamitende 4 bifite cyangwa bidafite moteri kimwe n`ubw`iyikorewe na romuruki zikuruwe n`ibyo binyabiziga ntibushobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
questions.option1: a) cm 30 ku bugari bw`icyo kinyabiziga kidapakiye
questions.option2: b) Ubugari ntarengwa budakuka ni metero 2 na sentimetero 50
questions.option3: c) A na B ni ibisubizo by`ukuri
questions.correctAnswer: c) A na B ni ibisubizo by`ukuri

questions.question: 40. Kunyura ku binyabiziga bindi, uretse icy`ibiziga bibiri, bibujijwe aha hakurikira:
questions.option1: a) Hafi y`iteme iyo hari umuhanda ufunganye
questions.option3: c) Hafi y`ibice by`umuhanda bimeze nabi
questions.option4: d) Ibi bisubizo byose ni ukuri
questions.correctAnswer: c) Hafi y`ibice by`umuhanda bimeze nabi
